reviewText:
my mom at time had alzheimers and enjoyed watching musicals since storys were to hard for her to follow. saw this, they had the lowest price,
so i bought it.
The oldie goldies in this collection are truly wonderful reminders of the glory of the Hollywood musical! I watch it frequently.
Musicals from Hollywood's Golden Age There are a lot of quality movies on this DVD. Good clean entertainment! I enjoyed them very much. Great value for the money.
Well, they may not all be classics, but there's certainly a worthwhile assortment of talent and songs here for the price: Astaire, Garland, Sinatra, Lena Horne, etc. A fun assortment.
